Summary: Looked like a soccer ball at first, rose from behind some trees. But it didn't fall again it just began to move slowly across the field until it dissapeared over in the direction of the highway.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Dublin
There were no other sightings in Dublin on or around August 20th 1998
divs: Sighting DetailsThis was the first of two events that i have witnessed in the same area, over a field beside my house in a housing estate in Dublin. I was standing at he railings when something that looked like a football caught my eye. It looked as if it was a soccer ball that someone had kicked over the trees. But when I expected it to land on the other side of the trees, the side I was watching from, it just seemed to hold it's altitude and move across the field in front of me. I realised that it was really silver and shiny. I just stood and watched it, (we had not got a video camera at the time), until it floated away past the motorway and ought of sight. I have told some people about the incident, but I don't think they elieved me. I hope you will.
